changes.with: no later than 5 Business Days or a mutually agreed-upon timeframe

changes.replace: commence shipping the relevant Battery Package
changes.with: commence shipping the relevant Battery Package within a reasonable time

changes.add: subject to any unforeseen logistical or transportation challenges

If the Principal delays issuing the Notice to Ship beyond the agreed Date for Shipment, any additional storage costs or logistics incurred by the Battery Supplier shall be compensated by the Principal, or the Battery Supplier may claim an extension of time in accordance with clause 19.3.

changes.replace: will be borne by the Battery Supplier
changes.with: will be borne by the Principal, except in cases where the Battery Supplier has failed to follow the shipping instructions and timelines as set forth by the Principal in the Notice to Ship

changes.add: provided that such costs were incurred due to delays directly caused by the Battery Supplier’s failure to comply with the agreed shipping timelines
changes.after: a debt due and payable from the Battery Supplier to the Principal

changes.with: fails to take such action despite receiving written notice from the Principal with reasonable time to respond

changes.add: If the action was action which the Battery Supplier should have taken at the Battery Supplier’s cost, the reasonable cost incurred by the Principal in the circumstances will be a debt due and payable immediately from the Battery Supplier to the Principal.
If the Principal takes action without prior notice due to a genuine emergency, the Battery Supplier shall only be liable for reasonable costs directly related to the protection of the Equipment.
